title: Dropping pronouns in Finnish and only using a suffix. When CAN'T you do it?

media:group.media:title: Dropping pronouns in Finnish and only using a suffix. When CAN'T you do it?
media:group.media:description:
Clarifying a few things from the "omistusliite" video! 

A questions was asked in the comment section: how do we know if someone is talking about h√§n or he, if the suffix for both of them are the same and the pronoun gets dropped?
A kind person called Mika answered this question also in the comments really well, so I wanted to make a video about it so nobody misses it!

Spoiler: you don't drop the pronoun when using 3rd person singular or plural!
